text:
Harvest | DevOps | Remote (or NYC if you prefer) | Full-time

Harvest is time tracking, invoicing, and project planning. We've been around for 11 years and have a stable and well-loved company with customers all over the world.

We are looking for Ops folks familiar with Kubernetes, Google Cloud, Docker, Jenkins, etc.

More details, and how to apply here: https://harvest.workable.com/j/F373023DDA

We are also looking for database experts (particularly MySQL). More details here: https://harvest.workable.com/j/51C33A041F
